metadata.title: CVE-2015-5211 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Under some situations, the Spring Framework 4.2.0 to 4.2.1, 4.0.0 to 4.1.7,3.2.0 to 3.2.14 and older unsupported versions is vulnerable to a ReflectedFile Download (RFD) attack. The attack involves a malicious user crafting aURL with a batch script extension that results in the response beingdownloaded rather than rendered and also includes some input reflected inthe response.

criterions.comment: libspring-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
